document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
148 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUK , ZMUM , NSPU , IMC ) from 16 provinces were studied.
Cherkasy Prov
. :
1 spec. ( ZMUK ) Kaniv Nature reserve , N.D. Globova leg.,
3.vi.1948
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Zvenihorodka Distr. , Murzyntsi
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Uman Distr. ,
20.v.1922
; Chernihiv Prov .:
4 spec. ( ZMUN ) Korop Distr. , Ryhly , V.N. Pavlyuk leg.,
2.ix.2004
; Chernivtsi Prov .:
1 spec. ( SIZK ) mount forest near Černivtsy ,
4.viii.1957
; Mykolaiv Prov. :
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Berezan Distr. , Koblevo , Tilihulsky Lyman ,
15.vi.1980
;
2 spec. ( SIZK ) idem,
15.v.1980
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Nova Odesa Distr. , Sebene, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
25.v.1982
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Mykolayiv Distr. , Starobohdanivka , Petrenko leg.,
16.v.1978
;
8 spec. ( SIZK ) Mykolayiv Distr. , Kuripchyno , M. Nesterov leg.,
25.v.1980
; Poltava Prov. :
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Poltava env., Th. Lukjanovitsh leg.,
12.iv.1923
;
1 spec. ( ZMUM ) Shishaky Distr. , Yaresky , D. Malyshev & A. Malyshev ,
29.v.1912
; Zaporizhia Prov. :
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Zaporizhia , Khortytsya Island, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
2.vii.1982
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Melitopol Distr. , Sosnovka , Staroberdyanskyi Forest ,
on
Onopordum acanthium , S.V. Volovnik
leg.,
2.ix.1982
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Yakymivka Distr. , Altagir , Altagir forest , S. V . Volovnik leg.,
7.vi.1977
;
14 spec. ( SIZK ) Rozyvka Distr. , Kamyani Mohyly Reserve, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
14.vi.1983
.

Biology. Primaryand secondary grasslands, ruderal habitats. Adults occur in IV–IX. Oligophagous on
Carduus
,
Cirsium
,
Silybum
,
Cousinia spp
. ( Asteraceae ) ( Ter-Minasian 1936 ;
Batra et al . 1981
; Zwölfer & Brandle 1989; Gültekin 2004b ).
Notes. Recorded in “Volhynian Upland” ( Mazur 2002 ), that includs now the parts of the modern territory of Volyn and Rivne provincies.
